thread.title: New on Netflix, Amazon, Hulu & more: Stream on Demand for October 23
thread.title_full: New on Netflix, Amazon, Hulu & more: Stream on Demand for October 23 | OregonLive.com

author: Sean Axmaker
title: New on Netflix, Amazon, Hulu & more: Stream on Demand for October 23
text:
What's new for home viewing on video-on-demand, Netflix, Amazon Prime and other streaming services.
Pay-Per-View/Video-On-Demand
" Jurassic World " revives the dinosaurs-in-the-modern-world franchise with Chris Pratt and Bryce Dallas Howard taking on prehistoric creatures with genetic enhancements. Great creatures, furious action, dubious decisions, and another lesson in the dangers of cloning ancient predators. PG-13 for "science fiction violence and peril." Available in 3D from select providers, also on DVD and Blu-ray.
" Paper Towns ," based on the young adult novel by John Green, stars Nat Wolff and Cara Delevingne in one last odyssey before high school graduation (PG).
Also new: the historical drama " Testament of Youth " with Alicia Vikander and Kit Harington and the horror film " The Vatican Tapes " (both PG-13).
Available same day as select theaters nationwide is " Bone Tomahawk ," a western with Kurt Russell and cannibal cave dwellers (no rating, mature audiences), and the drama " Meadowland " with Olivia Wilde and Luke Wilson (R).
Amazon Prime Instant Video
" The Hunger Games: Mockingjay â€“ Part 1 ," the top box office hit of 2014, arrives a month before the final film in the franchise debuts in theaters. This chapter delves into the power of propaganda and psychological warfare. Jennifer Lawrence once again sustains the film with her committed performance. Also on Hulu (PG-13).
Ben Stiller and Naomi Watts try to keep up with twentysomething couple Adam Driver and Amanda Seyfried in the comedy " While We're Young " (R).
Netflix
" Ain't Them Bodies Saints " (2013) is an atmospheric, poetic character piece with Rooney Mara and Casey Affleck as an outlaw couple in rural Texas. R for violence.
The indie romantic comedy " Results " (2015) stars Cobie Smulders and Guy Pearce as mismatched personal trainers and Kevin Corrigan as the new client who gets tangled in their lives (R).
" Hemlock Grove: Season 3 " is the final season of the gory Netflix Original horror series created by Eli Roth.
Kids' stuff: Animated heroes go at it in " Marvel's Avengers Assemble: Season 2 " and " Lego DC Comics: Batman Be-Leaguered ."
Hulu
" The Librarians: Season 1 ," a breezy, lighthearted adventure with magical dimensions, sends a motley team of treasure hunters in search of mythical artifacts. Rebecca Romjin is their FBI handler and Bruce Campbell plays Santa Claus in episode four. 10 episodes.
HBO Now
Now available: the stand-up comedy special " Amy Schumer: Live at the Apollo " (TV-MA) and the action thriller " Taken 3 " with Liam Neeson and his very specific skill set (PG-13).
Premiering on Saturday is the comedy " Bad Words " with Jason Bateman (R).
Showtime Anytime
" Compared to What: The Improbable Journey of Barney Frank " profiles the illustrious congressman.
New on disc
"Jurassic World," "San Andreas," "Paper Towns," "Testament of Youth," "Peaky Blinders"
Available at Redbox
"Pitch Perfect 2," "Testament of Youth," "Z for Zachariah," "Stolen"
Sean Axmaker is a Seattle film critic and writer. His reviews of streaming movies and TV can be found at streamondemandathome.com .
